articles.title: Pakistani actress promises to 'marry Zimbabwean guy' if they beat India in T20 World Cup - The Tribune India
articles.description: As victory over South Africa has kept Pakistan's T20 World Cup 2022 semi-finals qualification hopes alive, here is a Pakistani actress who has promised to 'marry Zimbabwean guy' if they beat India in T20 World Cup.
articles.content: The Tribune, now published from Chandigarh, started publication on February 2, 1881, in Lahore (now in Pakistan). It was started by Sardar Dyal Singh Majithia, a public-spirited philanthropist, and i… [+505 chars]

articles.title: Byju's ropes in Lionel Messi as global ambassador - Economic Times
articles.description: With a social media fanbase of  nearly 450 million, Lionel Messi - who plays for the French club Paris Saint-Germain and is the captain of the Argentinian football team - will feature in campaigns promoting Byju's Education For All initiative.
articles.content: Edtech major Byju's announced on Friday it has roped in professional footballer Lionel Messi as the global ambassador of its social impact arm Education For All. Messi, who plays for the French club … [+1719 chars]

articles.title: Recent Match Report - PAK Women vs Ire Women 1st ODI 2022/23 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Her 221-stand with fellow centurion Muneeba Ali also broke the Pakistan record for the highest partnership in the format
articles.content: Muneeba Ali and Sidra Ameen put up 221 runs for the first wicket - a record for Pakistan in ODIs  •  PCB
